comments.body: @aaudiber Were the changes to docstrings intentional?

@jsimsa 

The "grpc+local" protocol was not being supported while testing using:

```python
def testStartDispatcherWithProtocolConfig(self):
    config = server_lib.DispatcherConfig(port=5000, protocol="grpc+local")
    dispatcher = server_lib.DispatchServer(config=config, start=False)
    dispatcher.start()
```
The test was erroring out with:

```console
RuntimeError: No credentials factory has been registered for protocol grpc+local. The available types are: [ grpc ]
```
Yes, I originally planned to link the grpc+local protocol into the TF binary, but encountered issues using the protocol on windows and decided not to link it by default.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +40,44 @@      may bind to any available port.
    protocol: The protocol to use for communicating with the tf.data service.
      Defaults to `"grpc"`.
    work_dir: A directory to store dispatcher state in. This
      argument is required for the dispatcher to be able to recover from
